fields.original_string: private static final String eventName = OperationType.MODIFY.toString();

public static final DynamodbEvent.DynamodbStreamRecord record_event = (DynamodbEvent.DynamodbStreamRecord)
                new DynamodbEvent.DynamodbStreamRecord()
                        .withEventID(eventId)
                        .withEventName(eventName)
                        .withEventVersion(eventVersion)
                        .withEventSource(eventSource)
                        .withAwsRegion(awsRegion)
                        .withDynamodb(streamRecord_event)
                        .withUserIdentity(identity_event);

public static final Record record_v2 =
            Record.builder()
                    .eventID(eventId)
                    .eventName(eventName)
                    .eventVersion(eventVersion)
                    .eventSource(eventSource)
                    .awsRegion(awsRegion)
                    .dynamodb(streamRecord_v2)
                    .userIdentity(identity_v2)
                    .build();

methods.full_signature: public static Record toRecordV2(final DynamodbEvent.DynamodbStreamRecord record)

focal_method.full_signature: public static Record toRecordV2(final DynamodbEvent.DynamodbStreamRecord record)
